message.body: Are you back yet?
SoRaYaaAa
I'm older than the dancing queen...
Can you come pick me up later? I'm at max's but I really don't want to sleep at home and I just want to see you and not be with my parent s
Is there any way you could get a ride with someone?
Yes . Please stay up for me I NEEEED you
I'm gonna try. call me on your way over to make sure. what time do you think?
Soon ish
Within the next 30 minutes?
Dunno whenever Kylie wants to leave
Oooo you're at Max's perfect plz sneak into his backyard and gather some eggs for me
Wanna watch Orange is the New Black when I get back?
There's a dude in my class with a visible slap mark
I wanna go swimming in a stream/waterfall
Hey, I'm feelin like shit so if you could come over after Max n Co. I would really like it
Thornbury? I have 1% battery coming to your house with Kalev and Hannah
Actually jk, I'm making eggs and plan on watching a movie so I'll probably fall asleep before you get here
Wait yes come
Thornbury sounds great
When are you back
8:30ish
Tonight?
Yeah, I leave for the beach again tomorrow evening
Cool! I have two CDs for you
:D
YO THAT CUTE BAND IS PLAYING IN PHILLY TONIGHT LETS GO! The show's at 7:30 but I'm okay with being an hour late. Especially since there'll be mix CDs...
Yeah!! Can you drive?
I don't trust myself on highways
While lying to my parents about
It
You know?
Uh oh I've definitely used some of these songs on your other mix CDs. Oh well
Yeah, I feel ya. I can't drive either. should we try to find someone to take us?
Hannah?
Yeah, ask her!
I'm scared you do it. She'll probably be less offended if you ask
Why do you think that? She's gonna be offended either way. Also she hates driving in the city, so she'll almost definitely say no
Should we just not go?
I want to go, but there doesn't seem to be a way to get there and also I just realized that we'd be an hour and a half late cause it takes half an hour
to drive to the city
K nevermind. I'm sad
Me too, especially since we have planned this for like 2 months
Things I do not understand: People who have a ton of cabinets with nothing in them
I want a denim skirt. Like a short, tight denim skirt. Remember when those were a thing?
I'm watching Zoey 101 and like 4 people on screen right now are wearing them
Wanna tie dye stuff?!
Are you guys still there?
Yup
Should I just stay home?
I've got so much shit going on and I don't want to feel like I'm on the outside all night. I think I'm just going to stay home
nd I know I will cause I just keep crying at random moments and I don't really have any control over it
Nah, there's a lot of shit going on in my family and I've just been really sad and stressed out all night and I don't want to ruin your fun high times a
Just come we're not going anything we don't care
Me being sad is the reason Kalev doesn't talk to me anymore. I really don't think me coming over right now is a good idea
Do whatever you want more. Up to you
I've gotten progressively worse in the last 30 minutes. I just really want to talk to you. Text me when you're done at Kalevs
they're so easy to see
Did you know that Saturn is not the only planet with rings? All of the large, gaseous outside planets have them. Saturn's are ice, though, which is why
e people some good news.
Also, Pluto was never really regarded as a planet by the scientific community. Americans discovered it during the great depression and wanted to give th
Omg Noah Mendell's status
Watching Good Old Fashioned Orgy with my entire family. WOW THIS IS UNCOMFORTABLE
What??
It's a comedy starring Jason Sudiakus about a group of friends who try to organize an orgy
That's hilarious
That's us!
It would be us if we were 30 and had a huge empty house to ourselves. They throw so many phenomenal parties with incredibly themes
The theme of their orgy was kama sutra but the dude opened the book and there were pictures and i was like "HA YOU BITCHES HAVE NEVER READ IT"
GO LOOK AT THE MOON (ps i totally know how that happens btw)
I can't find it!
TRY TO FIND IT WALK TO A FIELD OR SOMETHING IT'S WORTH IT however the earth may have covered it with a shadow
When are you home
Tomorrow afternoon!
Wanna hang out tonight?!
Do you want to go to club risqué tonight
I'm kind of scared but I will. Just us?
With Hannah
Hannah has a thing for her grandmother tonight
Hmmm is there anyone else we can bring?
Gabe?
Text him!
We should go to Chicago
I wish you told me that while the tickets were still cheap!
I did! We had a plan!!
Also Gabe doesn't want to
You said you didn't want to go if it was just gonna be us and that it was gonna be a waste of money! Also, do you want to go swimming tonight?
Lets do the paint balloon thing!!!
Okay let's do it but we have to get a big canvas and darts and paint and balloons and some way to attach the balloons to the canvas
I just want to go to a strip club.
I doubt we'll find a canvas big enough. we need to find a wall, preferably drywall, and tape the balloons to it
A wall?? No one's going to offer up a wall
The woods?
....strip club
We CANNOT go just the two of us
Why not
Idk, I feel like I need someone else to push me into it. I feel too comfortable with just you to pretend to not be nervous, you know?
Also I just really wanna have a normal hangout with you
UGHHHHHH NO I NEED TO DO SKNETHINF EXCITING
PLEASE I MISS YOU
Lets hang out but I have to do something exciting I'm sorry I just have to
Ok
When do you get back
I got back around 1 and have been college shopping ever since
Lets go swimming
YESSSS
When?
I wish I had access to a slip n' slide
ANDREW JUST ASKED UUSS TO HANG OUT WITH HHIIMM
Yes...I realize
Group messages dude
When are you free
I WAS SAYING IT TO YOU FOR EMPHASIS i obvs know when things are a group message because it's like satan has gotten into my cell phone
7ish?
Just come out back when you get here
I feel like I've become your B-list friend and I really want to hang out with just you one of these days
Are you kidding me. I'm not even going to address that
Please don't say that. I can't remember the last time we really hung out and you didn't leave for someone else and I feel like Kalev and Hannah don't l
ike me and you have to choose between us and obviously you'll choose them because they're more fun but I just miss you so much and want to talk to you

Oh my god. I see my friends equally I don't HAVE B list friends. You've been gone for a week! And I really hate making decisions between my friends so I just have to do both wvery night they're not more fun ugh I can't argue about this it's very stupid
Wanna come to Ikea with my mom and brother? Free lunch
SORAYA
SHOULD I COME OR NOT
I came but then I didn't go inside because I felt too ashamed. Text me when you're done
